Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to stay in Chicago”
Reviews.Author: glofish5
Reviews.Content: sutton hotel chicago extremely pleasant hotel location near michigan avenue restaurants retail stores grocery stores weekend february deal included wonderful continental breakfast view rush street staff exceptionally friendly helpful concierge provided list events city free daily newspapers plus husband time enjoy oversize tub bathroom relaxing hotel provides bubbling mineral bath enhances experience hotel cut heartily recommend

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: cjivers
Reviews.Content: stayed nights feb 2010 attending wedding check check service efficient friendly beautiful maid service excellent located gold coast chicago expensive exclusive excellent shops restaurants five minutes ave oak street beach didnt spend time whiskey bar drew lot kids loud excellent hotel

Reviews.Title: “Better in years before”

Reviews.Content: stayed sutton valentines day weve 3 amazing location cant beat suites nice rates disappointed stay arrived late due traffic drop onto rush late dinner reservations park car lot block dinner reservations din loop conceriege call wed 15 minutes late didnt champagne wasnt arrived smelled previous guests smoked prior service excellent substandard try chicago hotel
